Title: Crafting Orders: Tailoring
Description:
So you are a tailor? You should have mentioned that earlier!

Let me send you to Kotag, a tailor of great renown, who has their shop on the eastern side of the Forgegrounds. I will mark it on your map. 

Kotag has their very own jeweler's bench where you can review, craft, and deliver work orders from public lists and personal contacts like friends and guilds. If you are lucky, you might come across an order from a renowned person that offers some extra rewards--or so I hear.
ObjectivesText: Find Kotag in the Forgegrounds and use their tailor table.
RewardText: Thank you for allowing me to assist you in your directive.
